text: Christopher John Wilson (1956 â€“ January 2019) was an Australian blues musician and singer-songwriter. == Biography == He played harmonica, saxophone, and guitar. He performed as part of the Sole Twisters, Harem Scarem and Paul Kelly and the Coloured Girls, and fronted his band Crown of Thorns. Wilson's solo albums are Landlocked (June 1992), The Long Weekend (March 1998), Spiderman (2000) King for a Day (July 2002), Flying Fish (2012) and the self titled Chris Wilson (2018). He was born in Melbourne. Wilson's death was announced on 16 January 2019 from pancreatic cancer at the age of 62. ==References== ==Other websites== * Portrait of Chris Wilson by Jacquelin Mitelman, 1997. title: Chris Wilson (Australian musician)
